author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/marathon/

Explore Marathon’s dark sci-fi world and survival extraction gameplay, as told by the development team.

Marathon releases March 2026.
Learn more: https://bung.ie/450dGSQ

Scavenge the lost colony of Tau Ceti IV as a bio-cybernetic Runner in a PvPvE survival extraction FPS from the creators of Halo and Destiny.

title: Marathon - Bungie ViDoc: Vision of Marathon | PS5 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/cult-of-the-lamb/

A lost God calls you from a mysterious mountain—rebuild the flock and reawaken winter to uncover the truth of the fallen lambs. Face the past before it consumes you in this full-length expansion for Cult of the Lamb. The Woolhaven full-length expansion for Cult of the Lamb is releasing January 22nd, 2026.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #cultofthelamb
title: Cult of the Lamb - Woolhaven Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The Manufacturers Cup is a competition to determine the world's fastest manufacturer for 2025. 

With the drivers who clinched the 2022 title reunited, expectations were high for Team Subaru to reach the World Finals undefeated. However, a loss in Round 3 dashed those hopes, setting the stage for a highly unpredictable title showdown.

Subaru currently tops the Points Ranking, but Mazda and BMW trail by just two points, with Porsche in fourth place. All three boast exceptional driver lineups and are determined to challenge Subaru and secure their first championship title.

At the start of the season, many predicted Team Subaru to struggle due to the characteristics of their car, but their form has been impressive. Can they rise to the occasion and fully utilise their talent to claim a second World Series title, or will a rival manufacturer finally secure a long-awaited first championship? Be sure to follow all the action and see who comes out on top!

A separate Live Timing stream whe
title: GT World Series 2025 | World Finals | Manufacturers Cup | Grand Final [ENGLISH]

author: PlayStation
description:
The final race of 2025, which will decide the world’s fastest driver in the GT World Series Nations Cup, is about to get underway.

The favourites for this year's title are undoubtedly Spain's Jose Serrano, who has shown superb speed this season, and young Spanish driver Pol Urra. Both drivers won the Nations Cup as part of Team Spain in 2023, but have yet to win an individual Nations Cup title. With the impressive form they've shown so far this season, it will be fascinating to see who will emerge victorious out of these talented Spanish drivers.

However, don’t overlook Italian Valerio Gallo, who trails Pol Urra by just a single point. Although he hasn’t won a race at a live event this season, he has been consistently collecting points and has all the tools to challenge the Spaniards. 

Can the in-form Spanish drivers achieve a one-two finish on the podium at the World Finals, or will the 2021 champion, who has shown that he can run with the very best, reclaim the title? Be sure to
title: GT World Series 2025 | World Finals | Nations Cup | Grand Final [ENGLISH]

author: PlayStation
description:
Choose your role in a BAFTA-winning story, and explore a world that reacts to who you are, and the choices you make. With five races to choose from, and an adventure playable solo or as a party of up to four, lay waste to an oppressive order in a world afraid of magic.

Divinity: Original Sin 2 is now available on PlayStation 5.

#ps5 #ps5games #divinityoriginalsin
title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
